title: Live Sports? In This Economy?
description: Hot Takedown covers a new poll about what fans need to feel safe at live sporting events and discuss how it applies to the NBA. Then, an NCAA bribery Rabbit Hole, as a treat.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
